square.field

Class ForceField

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.MultiSquare
      • square.field.Field
        • square.field.ForceField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableEffect

    public class ForceField
extends Field
    Force field is a obstacle which covers multiple squares and can be turned on and off.
    Author:
    Vincent

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACTIONS_OFF
      Amount of actions the force field is inactive.
      static int ACTIONS_ON
      Amount of actions the force field is active.
      static int MAX_LENGTH
      Maximum length of a Force Field.

      void decreaseActions()
      Decreases the action of the ForceField, if there are no remaining actions the state of the field is changed to active or inactive.

      • isValidSquare

        public boolean isValidSquare(Square square)
        Force field cannot extend its maximum length.
        Overrides:
        isValidSquare in class MultiSquare
        Parameters:
        square - The square to be checked
        Returns:
        True if and only the square is not not null and not yet part of the MutliSquare

      • decreaseActions

        public void decreaseActions()
        Decreases the action of the ForceField, if there are no remaining actions the state of the field is changed to active or inactive.
